metadata.Title: CVE-2020-26957 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: OneCRL was non-functional in the new Firefox for Android due to a missingservice initialization. This could result in a failure to enforce somecertificate revocations. *Note: This issue only affected Firefox forAndroid. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 83.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
mozjs52 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
